content: I recently bought an Intel NUC with an i7 cpu. Just afterwards, I was gifted the middle model Mac Mini. The NUC just tears shit up performance wise, but I’m still more comfortable on the Mac, despite poor performance. I’m probably going to be a dual OS person. Actually, three OSes: the majority of my time is spent in iOS. I just wish the iPad was sufficiently powerful to do more than basic video editing, but I’m told that is still five years out, if not longer. But anyway, you have it exactly right. Apple needs all of its pro users, especially those with intensive performance needs. It’s about the ecosystem and always has been.
